name: uvtxisvtx
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: simplbi(wcel(c0, cfv(cuvtx, c1)), wcel(c0, c2), wral(hs0, cdif(c2, csn(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cnbgr, c0))))
stmt.pretty: simplbi(c0 ∈(UnivVtx ` c1), c0 ∈ c2, ∀(hs0 ∈(c2 \ { c0 }), hs0 ∈(c1[NeighbVtx]c0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cuvtx, c1)), wcel(c0, c2))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cuvtx, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wral(hs0, cdif(c2, csn(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cnbgr, c0)))))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(UnivVtx ` c1)→ c0 ∈ c2)
⊣ (c0 ∈(UnivVtx ` c1)↔(c0 ∈ c2 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈(c2 \ { c0 }), hs0 ∈(c1[NeighbVtx]c0))))
